verses.verse: Therefore, <WG5620> my <WG3450> brothers, <WG80> beloved <WG27> and <WG2532> longed for, <WG1973> my <WG3450> joy <WG5479> and <WG2532> crown, <WG4735> so <WG3779> stand firm <WG4739> in <WG1722> the Lord, <WG2962> my beloved. <WG27>
I exhort <WG3870> Euodia, <WG2136> and <WG2532> I exhort <WG3870> Syntyche, <WG846> to <WG5426> think the same way in <WG1722> the Lord. <WG2962>

Yes, <WG2532> I beg <WG2065> you <WG4571> also, <WG2532> true <WG1103> yokefellow, <WG4805> help <WG4815> these women, <WG846> for they <WG3748> labored <WG4866> with me <WG3427> in <WG1722> the Good News, <WG2098> with <WG3326> Clement <WG2815> also, <WG2532> and <WG2532> the rest <WG3062> of my <WG3450> fellow workers, <WG4904> whose <WG3739> names <WG3686> are in <WG1722> the book <WG976> of life. <WG2222>
Rejoice <WG5463> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962> always! <WG3842> Again <WG3825> I will say, <WG2046> "Rejoice! <WG5463>"
Let <WG1097> your <WG5216> gentleness <WG1933> be known <WG1097> to <WG444> all <WG3956> men. <WG444> The Lord <WG2962> is at hand. <WG1451>

In nothing <WG3367> be anxious, <WG3309> but <WG235> in <WG1722> everything, <WG3956> by prayer <WG4335> and <WG2532> petition <WG1162> with <WG3326> thanksgiving, <WG2169> let <WG1107> your <WG5216> requests <WG155> be made known <WG1107> to <WG4314> God. <WG2316>

And <WG2532> the peace <WG1515> of God, <WG2316> which surpasses <WG5242> all <WG3956> understanding, <WG3563> will guard <WG5432> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588> and <WG2532> your <WG3540> thoughts <WG5216> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>

Finally, <WG3063> brothers, <WG80> whatever things <WG3745> are <WG2076> true, <WG227> whatever things <WG3745> are honorable, <WG4586> whatever things <WG3745> are just, <WG1342> whatever things <WG3745> are pure, <WG53> whatever things <WG3745> are lovely, <WG4375> whatever things <WG3745> are of good report; <WG2163> if <WG1487> there is any <WG5100> virtue, <WG703> and <WG2532> if <WG1487> there is any <WG5100> praise, <WG1868> think about <WG3049> these things. <WG5023>

The things <WG5023> which <WG3739> you <WG3129> <WG2532> learned, <WG3129> <WG2532> received, <WG3880> <WG2532> heard, <WG191> and <WG2532> saw <WG1492> in <WG1722> me: <WG1698> do <WG4238> these things, <WG2532> and the God <WG2316> of peace <WG1515> will be <WG2071> with <WG3326> you. <WG5216>

But <WG1161> I rejoice <WG5463> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962> greatly, <WG3171> that <WG3754> now <WG2235> at length <WG4218> you have revived <WG330> your thought <WG5426> for <WG5228> me; <WG1700> in <WG1909> which <WG3739> you did indeed <WG5426> take <WG2532> thought, <WG5426> but <WG1161> you lacked opportunity. <WG170>

Not <WG3756> that <WG3754> I speak <WG3004> in <WG1473> respect to lack, <WG5304> for <WG1063> I <WG1473> have learned <WG3129> in <WG1722> whatever <WG3739> state I am, <WG1510> to be <WG1511> content in it. <WG842>

I know <WG1492> <WG2532> how <WG1492> to be humbled, <WG5013> and <WG2532> I know also how <WG1492> to abound. <WG1722> In everything <WG3956> and <WG2532> in <WG1722> all things <WG3956> I have learned <WG3453> the secret both <WG2532> to be filled <WG5526> and <WG2532> to be hungry, <WG3983> both <WG2532> to abound <WG4052> and <WG2532> to be in need. <WG5302>
I can do <WG2480> all things <WG3956> through <WG1722> Christ, <WG5547> who <WG3588> strengthens <WG1743> me. <WG3165>
However <WG4133> you <WG4160> did <WG4160> well <WG2573> that you shared <WG4790> in <WG2347> my <WG3450> affliction. <WG2347>

You <WG5210> yourselves also <WG2532> know, <WG1492> you <WG5210> Philippians, <WG5374> that <WG3754> in <WG1722> the beginning <WG746> of the Good News, <WG2098> when <WG3753> I departed <WG1831> from <WG575> Macedonia, <WG3109> no <WG3762> assembly <WG1577> shared with <WG2841> me <WG3427> in <WG1519> the matter <WG3056> of giving <WG1394> and <WG2532> receiving <WG1487> but <WG3361> you <WG5210> only. <WG3441>
For <WG3754> even <WG2532> in <WG1722> Thessalonica <WG2332> you sent <WG3992> once <WG2532> <WG530> and <WG2532> again <WG1364> to <WG1519> my <WG3427> need. <WG5532>
Not <WG3756> that <WG3754> I seek <WG1934> for the gift, <WG1390> but <WG235> I seek <WG1934> for the fruit <WG2590> that increases <WG4121> to <WG1519> your <WG5216> account. <WG3056>

But <WG1161> I have <WG568> all <WG3956> things, <WG2532> and abound. <WG4052> I am filled, <WG4137> having received <WG1209> from <WG3844> Epaphroditus <WG1891> the things <WG3588> that came from <WG3844> you, <WG5216> a sweet-smelling <WG2175> fragrance, <WG3744> an acceptable <WG1184> and well-pleasing <WG2101> sacrifice <WG2378> to God. <WG2316>

<WG1161> My <WG3450> God <WG2316> will supply <WG4137> every <WG3956> <WG5216> need <WG5532> of yours <WG5216> according to <WG2596> his <WG846> riches <WG4149> in <WG1722> glory <WG1391> in Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>
Now <WG1161> to our <WG2257> God <WG2316> and <WG2532> Father <WG3962> be the glory <WG1391> <WG1519> forever <WG165> and ever! <WG165> Amen. <WG281>
Greet <WG782> every <WG3956> saint <WG40> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424> The brothers who are <WG80> with <WG4862> me <WG1698> greet <WG782> you. <WG5209>
All <WG3956> the saints <WG40> greet <WG782> you, <WG5209> especially <WG3122> <WG1161> those who are <WG3588> of <WG1537> Caesar <WG2541>'s household. <WG3614>
The grace <WG5485> of <WG2962> the <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216> all. <WG3956> Amen. <WG1891>
